statement.p: What is the solution to \displaystyle{32}={6}{x}+{2}? Preview Question 1 Â

solution.p: \displaystyle{32}={6}{x}+{2}. We undo the \displaystyle+{2} by subtracting from both sides.
\displaystyle{30}={6}{x}. We undo the multiplication by \displaystyle{6} by dividing by \displaystyle{6} on both sides.
